text: Paolo Poli (May 23, 1929 â€“ March 25, 2016) was an Italian theatre actor. He has also acted in movies and on television.Enciclopedia Treccani He starred in many famous operas such as Aldino mi cali un filino, Rita of Cascia, Caterina de Medici, L'asino d'oro, Gulliver's Travels, La leggenda di San Gregorio, Il coturno della ciabatta, and La nemica' ==References== ==Other websites== * * Poliscena Association: Paolo Poli's Theatre * Il mare of Paolo Poli Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Florence
title: Paolo Poli
